get.description: Error endpoint, which need to be used to test the exception monitor middleware.

Retrieve a list of accounts.

This endpoint requires authentication with the "admin" scope.
Retrieve a list of accounts for ranking.

Retrieve an account by ID.

This endpoint requires authentication with the "admin" scope.

patch.description:
Update an account by ID.

This endpoint requires authentication with the "admin" scope.

delete.description:
Delete an account by ID.

This endpoint requires authentication with the "admin" scope.

post.description: Logs in a user and returns an access token.

get.description: Returns the current user's account information.

put.description: Updates the current user's account information.

Modify the balance of an account by ID.

This endpoint requires authentication with the "admin" scope.

post.description: List the price of the given symbols.

put.description:
Modify the stock of an account by ID and symbol.

This endpoint requires authentication with the "admin" scope.

Account.title: Account
Account.description:
This this the account model that is linked to the database and used by the API.

Args:
    AccountBase: The base model to use.

RankedAccount.title: RankedAccount
RankedAccount.description:
This is the account model that is used by the API when the request is not authenticated.

Args:
    AccountBase: The base model to use.
